definition: happening or arising or located outside or beyond some limits or especially surface, outward features
details:
adjective
- happening or arising or located outside or beyond some limits or especially surface
= example: happening or arising or located outside or beyond some limits or especially surface
- purely outward or superficial
= example: purely outward or superficial
- from or between other countries
= example: from or between other countries
= synonyms: outside, international
- coming from the outside
= synonyms: outside
noun
- outward features
= example: outward features
